sub_title: Geotechnical Engineer at Fugro Netherlands Marine B.V.
summary:
Earth is (literally) my workplace. And treating it with respect is something that will always be my mission. As a senior consultant in the field of Geotechnics & Geohazards my team and I take soil samples and assess site properties worldwide for technical and commercial feasibility e.g. for wind turbines, pipelines, offshore structures etc.
 
My job has taken me all over the world. Working with diverse and skilled teams has always helped me to include multiple perspectives and interpretations. In critical times (when deadlines are near and stakes are high) I have been known to remain calm, level headed, problem solving and focused on client’s needs to provide the best solution.
 
I believe in the power of teamwork. Diversity & inclusion of multiple (cultural) perspectives, skills and experience leveIs help to provide sustainable high quality solutions for our clients. It also provides for a more inclusive, happy and stimulating workplace.
 
As a woman working in a typically male dominated environment, I have been faced with many and some cultural challenges. But I am happy to create new ways of working and bringing an enthusiastic voice and perspective to this environment.
 
Let’s connect
If you see any added value in a connection or if you would like to investigate the soil response of your site, then please feel free to send me a connection request or a direct message.
